name: size
description: Button size, accepts positive and negative numbers e.g. -4, 2.5, 1...etc. default: 0

name: title
description: Override title meta tag for LinkedIn and Reddit, default: null

name: description
description: Override description meta tag for LinkedIn, WhatsApp, Telegram and Pinterest, default: null

name: image
description: Override image meta tag for Pinterest only, default: null

name: tags
description: Override tags for Tumblr and Twitter, default: null

name: fbAccessToken
description: Used to get the share count of facebook, default: null

name: autoSetMeta
description: Initializes meta tag inputs from SEO meta tags, default: true

name: opened
description: Stream that emits when share window has opened

name: closed
description: Stream that emits when share window has closed

name: count
description: Stream that emits when share count is available
